cards.name: Accumulated Knowledge
cards.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
cards.flavor:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

cards.name: Acidic Slime
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

cards.name: Albino Troll
cards.text:
Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Albino Troll.

cards.name: Anathemancer
cards.text:
When Anathemancer enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
Unearth {5}{B}{R} ({5}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ancient Grudge
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

cards.name: Ancient Ziggurat
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
cards.flavor: Leylines branch out from its foundation like roots from a tree. These draw mana from every region and welcome all living things into its verdant chambers.

cards.name: Armadillo Cloak
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor:
"Don't laugh. It works."
—Yavimaya ranger

cards.name: Arrogant Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
Madness {2}{G} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: It's hard to be humble when the whole world is bite size.

cards.name: Artisan of Kozilek
cards.text:
When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

cards.name: Astral Slide
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"The hum of the universe is never off-key."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Aura of Silence
cards.text:
Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
cards.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

cards.name: Avalanche Riders
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

cards.name: Banisher Priest
cards.text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
cards.flavor: "Oathbreaker, I cast you out!"

cards.name: Banishing Light
cards.text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Basking Rootwalla
cards.text:
{1}{G}: Basking Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Bile Blight
cards.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Not an arrow loosed, javelin thrown, nor sword raised. None were needed.

cards.name: Black Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
cards.flavor:
"The chill, to him who breathed it, drew / Down with his blood, till all his heart was cold."
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, Idyls of the King

cards.name: Blastoderm
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

cards.name: Bloodbraid Elf
cards.text:
Haste
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

cards.name: Bottle Gnomes
cards.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Brain Maggot
cards.text: When Brain Maggot enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Brain Maggot leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"I see more than other because I know where to look"
—Saprazzan vizier

cards.name: Browbeat
cards.text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
cards.flavor:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

cards.name: Cabal Coffers
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.
cards.flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun-and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

cards.name: Cabal Therapy
cards.text:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Call of the Conclave
cards.text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

cards.name: Capsize
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Carnophage
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"And in their blind and unattaining state their miserable lives have sunk so low that they must envy every other fate."
—Dante, Inferno, trans. Ciardi

cards.name: Carrion Feeder
cards.text:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
cards.flavor: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

cards.name: Chainer's Edict
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: The pits have their own form of mercy.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Red
cards.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circular Logic
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Cloudpost
cards.text:
Cloudpost enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool for each Locus on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "He watches from above. He watches from below. He watches from within." -Inscription on Tel-Jilad, the Tree of Tales

cards.name: Contagion Clasp
cards.text:
When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Crystalline Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly-they know they cannot be caught.

cards.name: Cultivate
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

cards.name: Death
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters

cards.name: Deep Analysis
cards.text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: "The specimen seems to be broken."

cards.name: Desert
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

cards.name: Despise
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"Truth is always a weapon in your enemies' hands."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

cards.name: Dimir Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to."
—Lazav

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Dismember
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."
—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

cards.name: Dissipate
cards.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

cards.name: Dissolve
cards.text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
cards.flavor: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"We decide who is worthy of our works."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

cards.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
cards.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."
—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

cards.name: Elvish Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

cards.name: Elvish Visionary
cards.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

cards.name: Encroaching Wastes
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.
cards.flavor: Every world is a work in progress, constantly reshaped by time, disasters, and even the powerful magic of Planeswalkers.

cards.name: Engineered Plague
cards.text:
As Engineered Plague enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
cards.flavor:
"The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results."
—Phyrexian progress notes

cards.name: Eternal Witness
cards.text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Gaea needs no book to record every act.

cards.name: Everflowing Chalice
cards.text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

cards.name: Experiment One
cards.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

cards.name: Fact or Fiction
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Fanatic of Xenagos
cards.text:
Trample
Tribute 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, an opponent of your choice may place a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Fanatic of Xenagos enters the battlefield, if tribute wasn't paid, it gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Farseek
cards.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

cards.name: Fire
cards.text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

cards.name: Fireblast
cards.text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Firebolt
cards.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

cards.name: Fireslinger
cards.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"One pain is lessened by another's anguish."
—William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

cards.name: Flametongue Kavu
cards.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay

cards.name: Forbid
cards.text:
Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell.

cards.name: Forbidden Alchemy
cards.text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Force Spike
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
cards.text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

cards.name: Gerrard's Verdict
cards.text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

cards.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
cards.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

cards.name: Ghostly Prison
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"May the memory of our fallen heroes ensnare the violent hearts of lesser men."
—Great Threshold of Monserkat inscription

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Gitaxian Probe
cards.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"My flesh holds no secrets, monster. The spirit of Mirrodin will fight on."
—Vy Covalt, Mirran resistance

cards.name: Glistener Elf
cards.text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
cards.flavor: "Beg me for life, and I will fill you with the glory of Phyrexian perfection."

cards.name: Go for the Throat
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
cards.flavor: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

cards.name: Goblin Bombardment
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

cards.name: Goblin Legionnaire
cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.name: Goblin Ringleader
cards.text:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Goblin Warchief
cards.text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.
cards.flavor: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

cards.name: Grisly Salvage
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

cards.name: Ice
cards.text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Icy Manipulator
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

cards.name: Impulse
cards.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Isochron Scepter
cards.text:
Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand.
{2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Izzet Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Jace's Ingenuity
cards.text: Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

cards.name: Jackal Pup
cards.text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war."
—William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

cards.name: Judge's Familiar
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
cards.flavor:
"It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor."
—Barvisa, courtroom scribe

cards.name: Juggernaut
cards.text:
Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
cards.flavor: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

cards.name: Kird Ape
cards.text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
cards.flavor: It puts the "fur" in "fury."

cards.name: Kitchen Finks
cards.text:
When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Krosan Grip
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

cards.name: Krosan Tusker
cards.text:
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Krosan Warchief
cards.text:
Beast spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
cards.flavor: It turns prey into predator.

cards.name: Life
cards.text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
cards.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. & Anthony S. Waters

cards.name: Lightning Greaves
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
cards.flavor: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

cards.name: Lightning Rift
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, Lightning Rift deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Options will cost you, but a lack of options will cost you even more.

cards.name: Lingering Souls
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Lobotomy
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Longbow Archer
cards.text: First strike; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."
—Roya, Zhalfirin archer

cards.name: Magma Jet
cards.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Magma Spray
cards.text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: A stone hurled at an enemy is deadlier in liquid form.

cards.name: Merrow Reejerey
cards.text:
Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.
cards.flavor: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

cards.name: Mind Warp
cards.text: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
cards.flavor: The hardest of wizards can have the softest of minds.

cards.name: Mogg Fanatic
cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it."
—Herman Melville, Moby Dick

cards.name: Mother of Runes
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "My family protects all families."

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Murderous Redcap
cards.text:
When Murderous Redcap enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Muscle Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

cards.name: Myr Enforcer
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
cards.flavor: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Ophidian
cards.text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I will ... tell thee more than thou hast wit to ask."
—Christopher Marlowe, Doctor Faustus

cards.name: Pendelhaven
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

cards.name: Pillar of Flame
cards.text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
cards.flavor: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

cards.name: Priest of Titania
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each Elf on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Titania rewards all who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

cards.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Qasali Pridemage
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

cards.name: Quirion Ranger
cards.text: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor:
"I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."
—Henry David Thoreau, Walden

cards.name: Rakdos Cackler
cards.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

cards.name: Rancor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Hatred outlives the hateful.

cards.name: Reanimate
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath

cards.name: Reliquary Tower
cards.text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

cards.name: Remand
cards.text:
Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive.

cards.name: Resurrection
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more." —War blessing of Serra

cards.name: Rhox War Monk
cards.text: Lifelink
cards.flavor: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

cards.name: Rift Bolt
cards.text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: River Boa
cards.text:
Islandwalk
{G}: Regenerate River Boa.
cards.flavor:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, Tales

cards.name: Roar of the Wurm
cards.text:
Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
cards.text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Slain orochi warriors were buried with a tree sapling so they would become part of the forest after death.

cards.name: Savage Lands
cards.text:
Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

cards.name: Scragnoth
cards.text:
Scragnoth can't be countered.
Protection from blue
cards.flavor: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

cards.name: Seal of Cleansing
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

cards.name: Searing Spear
cards.text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

cards.name: Serrated Arrows
cards.text:
Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Shock
cards.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Lightning tethers souls to the world. —Kor saying

cards.name: Shrapnel Blast
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: To the Krark Clan, every artifact has a trigger and a barrel.

cards.name: Silver Knight
cards.text: First strike, protection from red
cards.flavor: Otaria's last defense against the wave of chaos threatening to engulf it.

cards.name: Sin Collector
cards.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
cards.flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

cards.name: Slice and Dice
cards.text:
Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature.
Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Smother
cards.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Soltari Priest
cards.text:
Protection from red
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
cards.flavor: "Fire is the test of gold; adversity of strong men." - Seneca, "On Providence," trans. Basara

cards.name: Sparksmith
cards.text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

cards.name: Spellstutter Sprite
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

cards.name: Spike Feeder
cards.text:
Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Squadron Hawk
cards.text:
Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Staunch Defenders
cards.text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Stoke the Flames
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: "Peace hath her victories No less renownd than war." - John Milton, "To the Lord General Cromwell"

cards.name: Tectonic Edge
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Tectonic Edge: Destroy target nonbasic land. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls four or more lands.
cards.flavor:
"We move because the earth does."
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

cards.name: Teetering Peaks
cards.text:
Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Tendrils of Agony
cards.text:
Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Terminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."

cards.name: Terror
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
cards.flavor: Raissa transformed herself into a vessel for the Watchword Codex, allowing the arcane lore to flow through her body.

cards.name: Tidehollow Sculler
cards.text:
When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Tormented Hero
cards.text:
Tormented Hero enters the battlefield tapped.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tormented Hero, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.name: Tormod's Crypt
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

cards.name: Treetop Village
cards.text:
Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

cards.name: Volcanic Geyser
cards.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? —Femeref riddle

cards.name: Wall of Blossoms
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Everything in Nature contains all the powers of Nature." - Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Compensation"

cards.name: Wall of Omens
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
—Expedition journal entry

cards.name: Wall of Roots
cards.text:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor: Root systems in Mwonvuli twist through currents of mana rather than soil.

cards.name: Warleader's Helix
cards.text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."
—Aurelia

cards.name: Watchwolf
cards.flavor: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

cards.name: Whipcorder
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: His bolas whirl like galaxies, but it's his enemies who see stars.

cards.name: White Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
cards.flavor:
"When good men die their goodness does not perish, / But lives though they are gone."
—Euripides, Termenidae, trans. Morgan

cards.name: Wild Mongrel
cards.text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It teaches you to play dead.

cards.name: Wild Nacatl
cards.text:
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
cards.flavor: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

cards.name: Willbender
cards.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

cards.name: Wing Shards
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Withered Wretch
cards.text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
cards.flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

cards.name: Wonder
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
cards.flavor:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
—Scroll of Beginnings

cards.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}.
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
